ARABIC: فَلَا يَحْزُنكَ قَوْلُهُمْ إِنَّا نَعْلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So do not let their words distress you. We know what they keep secret and what they divulge.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: So be not grieved by what they say. We certainly know what they hide and disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Let not their words grieve you. Surely We know all things about them, what they conceal and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Muhammad, let not their words annoy you. We certainly know whatever they conceal or reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Therefore (O dear Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him) do not grieve because of what they (the disbelievers) say; indeed We know what they conceal and what they disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, let not their speech then grieve you. Verily, We know what they conceal and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Therefore let not their speech grieve you; surely We know what they do in secret and what they do openly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: So do not let their saying grieve thee; assuredly We know what they keep secret and what they publish.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So let not their speech grieve thee (O Muhammad). Lo! We know what they conceal and what proclaim.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Let not their words grieve you. We have knowledge of all that they conceal and all that they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: So let not their speech grieve thee. Verily We! We know whatsoever they keep secret and whatsoever they make known.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: So do not let their remarks grieve you. We indeed know whatever they hide and whatever they disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Let not their speech, then, grieve thee. Verily We know what they hide as well as what they disclose.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So let not their speech, then, grieve you (O Muhammad SAW). Verily, We know what they conceal and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: So do not let their sayings grieve you. Surely, We have knowledge of what they hide and all that they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So let their words not sadden you. We know what they conceal, and what they reveal.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So let not their speech grieve you. Indeed, We know what they conceal and what they declare.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [36:76] So do not be grieved by their remarks, to you, that you have not been sent [by God] and otherwise. Assuredly We know what they conceal and what they proclaim, in this respect and otherwise, and We will requite them accordingly.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 503 (So let not their speech) their denial (grieve thee) Muhammad. (Lo! We know what they conceal) of plotting and treachery (and proclaim) of enmity.
